page.title: 02SMANNELL AND ENHAM SCHOOL
page.content: {RELIGION.}Smannell and Enham School is a Church of England School, closely connected with our church, Christ Church. There are 2 parts to the school. One part being 17 years old the other being 113 years old. We have many {CLUBS} in our school:- country dancing, gym, athletics and rounders.{ {SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY} is assisted by the use of 2 BBC Computers.The schools {EDUCATION} is the responsibility of Mr.Barber,headmaster, Mrs.Curran and Mrs.Lafferty. The children who come to our school come mainly from Enham. Some come from Little London and 2 come from Smannell. The rest of the 43 children come from the villages around Smannell. Mrs.Todd cooks our dinner. Two ladies help her. Mrs.Waite is our caretaker. Mrs.Newnham is the School secretary. Mrs.Turver and Mrs.Brant look after us at dinner playtime.
